c:
\mathcal{L}_{\mu}[f](s) 
  = 
  \int_{\mathbb{R}_+} 
  f(a + \tau u) e^{-s(a+ \tau u)} u \, d\tau ,

|f(a+ ru) e^{-s(a+ru)} r| 
  \leq |\psi(u, r)r / u|   
  \leq (\kappa_1 e^{-\mathrm{Re}(as)}) 
        e^{-\epsilon r} r.

\frac{d}{du}\mathcal{L}_{\mu}[f](s)
  =
  \int_{\mathbb{R}_+} \frac{\partial \psi}{\partial u} (u, t) \, dt
  =
  \lim_{r \to +\infty}
  \int_{0}^r \frac{\partial \psi}{\partial u} (u, t) \, dt = 0.

\int_{\gamma_k^r} f(z) e^{-sz} \, dz
  = \int_0^1 f((tr) u_k) e^{-s((tr)u_k)} r u_k \, dt
  = \int_0^r f(t u_k) e^{-s(t u_k)} u_k \, dt

\mathcal{L}_{\gamma_1}[f](s)
  - 
  \mathcal{L}_{\gamma_0}[f](s)
  =
  \lim_{r\to +\infty} 
  \left( 
  \int_{\gamma_1^r} f(z) e^{-sz} dz
  -
  \int_{\gamma_0^r} f(z) e^{-sz} dz
  \right).

\int_{\mu_r} f(z) e^{-sz} dz
  =
  \int_{\nu_r} f(z) e^{-sz} dz.

\left| \int_{\nu_r} f(z) e^{-sz} dz \right|
  \leq \kappa e^{-\epsilon r}r |u_1 - u_0|
